description: Numbers n such that continued fraction for sqrt(n) has odd period and central terms 55.
mathematica: ct55Q[n_]:=Module[{c=ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[n]],len},len=Length[c[[2]]];OddQ[len]&&Take[c[[2]],{Floor[len/2],Ceiling[len/2]}]=={55,55}]; cfsqrtn[ upto_]:=Module[{rng=Complement[ Range[upto],Range[Floor[Sqrt[upto]]]^2]}, Select[rng,ct55Q]]; cfsqrtn[740000] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 08 2012 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: Corrected by Harvey P. Dale, Mar 08 2012
